Abderraouf Derradji (amụrụ na 10 Disemba 1989), nke a maara dịka Soolking, bụ onye Algeria na-agụ egwu na onye na-eti egwu
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'okpuru aha nzuzo MC Sool ruo 2013 tupu ọ nabata aha ọhụrụ ya
Ọ na-etinye reggae, hip hop na raï Algeria na egwu ya.
A mụrụ Derradji na Algeria n'ebe ugwu nke isi obodo Algiers, nke a makwaara dị ka Staouali
Nna ya bụ onye na-akụ egwu ma ọ malitere n'oge ọ dị obere n'òtù egwu rock na-etinye egwu na ịgba egwu
Ọ bịarutere na France n'afọ 2008, mana ọ laghachiri Algeria ka etinye ya na usoro rap Algeria Africa Jungle
Ọ malitere ọrụ nke onwe ya na 2016 ma bịanye aka na akara Affranchis Music nke Sofiane malitere

O nwere ihe ịga nke ọma mbụ ya na "Milano" na "Guérilla" tupu ihe ịga nke ukwuu na "Dalida", otuto nye onye na-agụ egwu Dalida, na-anwale egwu ya "Paroles, paroles". N'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2018, Soolking wepụtara abọm mbụ ya bụ Fruit du démon nke e nyere akara ọla edo na France

N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2019, Soolking mere nnukwu egwu na Stade n'afọ 1955, ya na L'Algérino, Fianso, Alonzo na Dhurata Dora. Mgbe ha na-abanye n'ámá egwuregwu ahụ, mmadụ ise nwụrụ n'ihi mkpọtụ ahụ
Soolking kwuru mgbe egwú ahụ gasịrị na ọ bụrụ na ọ maara ihe merenụ ọ gaara akagbu egwú ahụ, otu n'ime ihe kpatara ihe mberede ahụ bụ na a na-ere tiketi karịa ikike ámá egwuregwu ahụ.
